```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(data.table)
library(sf)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggiraph)
library(ggimage)
library(COGugaison)
library(ggrepel)

# sorties

COMM_nbvoies_ANIM_1 <- fread( file = "./data_fantoir/COMM_nbvoies_ANIM_1.csv", verbose = F)
COMM_nbvoies_FA_1 <- fread( file = "./data_fantoir/COMM_nbvoies_FA_1.csv", verbose = F)

COMM_nbvoies_ANIM_1.tr <- COMM_nbvoies_ANIM_1 %>% gather(nom_voie, nb, - CODE_DEPCOM) %>% mutate( nb =as.numeric(nb))
COMM_nbvoies_FA_1.tr <- COMM_nbvoies_FA_1 %>% gather(nom_voie, nb, - CODE_DEPCOM) %>% mutate( nb =as.numeric(nb))

# carto
dep <- st_read( "./data_fantoir/dep.shp")
# centroides
dep.ctr <- dep %>% st_centroid(of_largest_polygon = FALSE) %>%
  mutate(x_ctr = map_dbl(geometry, ~st_centroid(.x)[[1]]),
         y_ctr = map_dbl(geometry, ~st_centroid(.x)[[2]])) 


# fonction pour gérer accents
conv_accents <- function(x) {
  x <- gsub(pattern = "è", replacement = "&egrave;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "é", replacement = "&eacute;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ê", replacement = "&ecirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ë", replacement = "&euml;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "î", replacement = "&icirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ï", replacement = "&iuml;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "û", replacement = "&ucirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ü", replacement = "&uuml;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ô", replacement = "&ocirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "à", replacement = "&agrave;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "â", replacement = "&acirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ç", replacement = "&ccedil;", x = x)
  
  x <- gsub(pattern = "è", replacement = "&Egrave;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "é", replacement = "&Eacute;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ê", replacement = "&Ecirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ë", replacement = "&Euml;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "î", replacement = "&Icirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ï", replacement = "&Iuml;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "û", replacement = "&Ucirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ü", replacement = "&Uuml;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ô", replacement = "&Ocirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "à", replacement = "&Agrave;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "â", replacement = "&Acirc;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "ç", replacement = "&Ccedil;", x = x)
  x <- gsub(pattern = "'", replacement = "&apos;", x = x)
  
  return(x)
}

```



## Analyse Faune



```{r carte_ANIM_dep_graphique,echo=F, message=F, warning=F ,fig.height=6,fig.width=9, include=TRUE}

TOT_nbvoies_ANIM_1.tr <-
  COMM_nbvoies_ANIM_1.tr %>%
  group_by(nom_voie) %>%
  summarise(nb = sum(nb)) %>%
  filter(!nom_voie %in% 'nb_voies') %>%
  mutate(nom_voie = str_replace_all(nom_voie,"nb_voies_","")) %>%
  mutate(type_ANIM =  case_when(nom_voie %in% c('CASTORS','CHEVREUILS','ECUREUILS') ~ "Mammifères" ,
                                nom_voie %in% c('CIGALES','GRILLONS','PAPILLONS') ~ "Insectes",
                                TRUE ~ "Oiseaux"))

#     title = "Odonymes les plus courants dans la catégorie 'Faune' ",
#     subtitle = "toute France",
#     caption = "Source : Fantoir"
#   ) 

ggplot() +
  geom_label_repel(data = TOT_nbvoies_ANIM_1.tr %>% filter(nb > 100), 
                   aes(x= nb, y = 1, label = nom_voie, size =  nb, fill = type_ANIM), 
                   angle = 0, label.size =  0, color = "black",#size = 2.5,
                   nudge_y = 0, segment.color = NA, fontface = "bold", box.padding = unit(0.05, "lines"), point.padding = unit(0.05, "lines")) +
  scale_x_continuous(name = "", breaks = c(150,250,500,1000,2000)) +
  scale_y_continuous(name ="",limits = c(0.2,1.8)) +
  coord_flip() +
  #scale_fill_distiller(palette = "Greens", direction = 1) +
  scale_fill_manual( name = "Type d'animaux : ", values = c("#335667", "#B3D2EE","#489be7")) +
  scale_size_continuous(range = c(1,8), guide = FALSE) +
  theme_ipsum() +
  annotate("text", x = 2000,y=0.3, label = "Noms de rues\nles plus fréquents",fontface="bold", family="Calibri", size =3, color ="#b2182b") +
  geom_segment(aes(x = 300, y = 0.3, xend = 1900, yend = 0.3), colour='grey', size=0.6,arrow = arrow(length = unit(0.2, "cm"))) +
  labs(    title = "Odonymes les plus courants dans la catégorie 'Faune' ",
           #subtitle = "toute France",
           caption = "Source : Fantoir") +
  #theme_ipsum_rc(grid="XY") +
  #theme(axis.text.x=element_text(hjust=c(0, 0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 1))) +
  theme(legend.position=c(0.9,0.7), 
        axis.text.x = element_blank(), axis.line.x = element_blank(),axis.ticks.x=element_blank(),
        panel.grid.minor= element_blank(),panel.grid.major.x= element_blank())



          
```


Les mésanges font la loi :


```{r carte_ANIM_dep_max,echo=F, message=F, warning=F ,fig.height=7,fig.width=9, include=TRUE}


DEP_nbvoies_ANIM_1.max <- COMM_nbvoies_ANIM_1.tr %>%
  mutate(CODGEO =  case_when(substr(CODE_DEPCOM,1,2) %in% '75'~ "75056",
                             substr(CODE_DEPCOM,1,3) %in% '132'~ "13055",
                             substr(CODE_DEPCOM,1,4) %in% '6938'~ "69123", TRUE ~ as.character(CODE_DEPCOM)) ) %>%
  left_join(table_supracom_2016 %>% dplyr::select(CODGEO, DEP), by = "CODGEO")  %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(DEP, nom_voie) %>%
  summarise(nb = sum(nb)) %>%
  filter(!nom_voie %in% 'nb_voies') %>%
  top_n(n=1) %>%
  distinct(DEP, nb, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(nom_voie = str_replace_all(nom_voie,"nb_voies_",""))



ggplot() +
  # contours departements
  geom_sf(data = dep %>%
            left_join(DEP_nbvoies_ANIM_1.max , by = c("DEP") ),
          aes(fill = nom_voie), color = "grey90", stroke = 0.5) +
  geom_text(data = dep.ctr %>%
                left_join(DEP_nbvoies_ANIM_1.max , by = c("DEP") ),
                         aes(x = x_ctr, y = y_ctr,size = nb, label = nom_voie ),
                         size = 2,  show.legend = FALSE) +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette = "Paired", name = "" ,guide=FALSE) +
  scale_x_continuous(name = "") +
  scale_y_continuous(name = "") +
  coord_sf(crs = 2154, datum = NA) +
  theme_fivethirtyeight() +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(),
        legend.box = "vertical",
        legend.position = "right",
        panel.grid = element_line(size = 0),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = NA),
        text = element_text(family="Helvetica")) +
  labs(
    title = "Odonyme majoritaire dans la catégorie 'Faune' ",
    subtitle = "par département",
    caption = "Source : Fantoir"
  ) 

          
```

Les mésanges font la loi :


```{r carte_FA_dep_max,echo=F, message=F, warning=F ,fig.height=7,fig.width=9, include=TRUE}
library(RColorBrewer)

DEP_nbvoies_FA_1.max <- COMM_nbvoies_FA_1.tr %>%
  mutate(CODGEO =  case_when(substr(CODE_DEPCOM,1,2) %in% '75'~ "75056",
                             substr(CODE_DEPCOM,1,3) %in% '132'~ "13055",
                             substr(CODE_DEPCOM,1,4) %in% '6938'~ "69123", TRUE ~ as.character(CODE_DEPCOM)) ) %>%
  left_join(table_supracom_2016 %>% dplyr::select(CODGEO, DEP), by = "CODGEO")  %>%
  ungroup() %>%
  group_by(DEP, nom_voie) %>%
  summarise(nb = sum(nb)) %>%
  filter(!nom_voie %in% 'nb_voies') %>%
  top_n(n=1) %>%
  distinct(DEP, nb, .keep_all = TRUE) %>%
  mutate(nom_voie = str_replace_all(nom_voie,"nb_voies_",""))


ggplot() +
  # contours departements
  geom_sf(data = dep %>%
            left_join(DEP_nbvoies_FA_1.max , by = c("DEP") ),
          aes(fill = nom_voie), color = "grey90", stroke = 0.5) +
  geom_text(data = dep.ctr %>%
                left_join(DEP_nbvoies_FA_1.max , by = c("DEP") ),
                         aes(x = x_ctr, y = y_ctr,size = nb, label = nom_voie ),
                         size = 2,  show.legend = FALSE) +
  scale_fill_manual(guide=FALSE, name = "",values =  colorRampPalette(brewer.pal(8, "Set2"))(DEP_nbvoies_FA_1.max %>% ungroup() %>% distinct(nom_voie) %>% nrow())) +
  scale_x_continuous(name = "") +
  scale_y_continuous(name = "") +
  coord_sf(crs = 2154, datum = NA) +
  theme_fivethirtyeight() +
  theme(axis.text = element_blank(),
        legend.position = "right",
        legend.box = "vertical",
        panel.grid = element_line(size = 0),
        panel.background = element_rect(fill = NA),
        text = element_text(family="Helvetica")) +
  labs(
    title = "Odonyme majoritaire dans la catégorie 'Flore' ",
    subtitle = "par département",
    caption = "Source : Fantoir"
  ) 

          
```


### Les rues de la flore dans le détail



```{r carte_FA_idw,echo=F, message=F, warning=F ,fig.height=2.5,fig.width=9, include=TRUE}

library(png)
library(grid)
library(gridExtra)

img2 <-  rasterGrob(as.raster(readPNG("./img_func/FA_1/nb_voies_BRUYERES.png")), interpolate = FALSE)
img3 <-  rasterGrob(as.raster(readPNG("./img_func/FA_1/nb_voies_CAMELIAS.png")), interpolate = FALSE)
img4 <-  rasterGrob(as.raster(readPNG("./img_func/FA_1/nb_voies_CHATAIGNIERS.png")), interpolate = FALSE)
grid.arrange(img1, img2, img3, img4, ncol = 4)



img1 <-  rasterGrob(as.raster(readPNG("./img_func/FA_1/nb_voies_GENETS.png")), interpolate = FALSE)
```
